_list/newest.description: return the element where field 'created' exists and has the highest value as json.

_list/jobs_of_user_and_feedback.description: return a list of jobs where the attribute username is the given username and all documents that have the same jobId (which means including the feedback the user got).

=json.description: object with title and created only

=overview.description: render a table with created date and title as cols

_list/terms_of_use_pages.description: render a table with all agreements.

usage._view/all_soa_activation: @see all + and with type SOA_ACTIVATION and attributes roleId and soaActivePages. Must have at least one active page.

_list/of_user.description: return a list of docs where the attribute username is the given username.

usage._view/history_soa_activation: @see all_soa_activation + that are not active anymore

_list/soa_activations.description: render activations for terms of usage agreements. provide html.

_list/with_job_id.description: return a list of jobs where the jobId is the given jobId.

_list/newest_with_facility_key.description: the newest document of type JOB_DATA_PROCESSING matching the given facility key as json.

couchapp.name: Facility Access Manager
couchapp.description: Design documents for the Facility Access Manager
